entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a wizard who receives gifts from his friends.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, who wrote to Hermione about Harry's situation and sent him a Pocket Sneakoscope.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend, who is on holiday in France and received news from Ron about Harry's situation.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Ron's brother, who thinks the Pocket Sneakoscope is rubbish sold for wizard tourists.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: One of Ron's brothers, who put beetles in Bill's soup.

entities.name: george
entities.description: Ron's other brother, who also put beetles in Bill's soup.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Harry's owl, who brought him a present from Hermione.

relationships.description: Ron sent Harry a Pocket Sneakoscope.
Ron informed Hermione about his phone call to Uncle Vernon and Harry's situation.
Hedwig brought Harry a present from Hermione.
